Title: Object: King Farouk
Description: Stencil, pigment and gum arabic on recycled cardboard. Portrait of King Farouk of Egypt with Ottoman textile design in the background. Signed.
School/style: Middle East & North Africa Modern Art
Bibliographic references: Porter 2006 / Word into Art: Artists of the Middle East (86a)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2023 4 July - 22 Oct, Barcelona, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2022 -2023 22 Nov - 26 Mar, Palma, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2022 28 Jun - 9 Oct, Zaragoza, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2015-2016, Dec-Mar, Seoul Arts Centre, 'Human Image' 2006 18 May-2 Sept, London, BM, Word into Art, cat.86a
